markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Inoculation Subroutine](/Feats.aspx?ID=2468) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Android" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=334" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 72 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your nanites reject diseases with ease. Each time you succeed at a Fortitude save against an ongoing [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), you reduce its stage by 2, or by 1 against a [virulent](/Traits.aspx?ID=162) disease. Each critical success you achieve against an ongoing disease reduces its stage by 3, or by 2 against a virulent disease.
name: Inoculation Subroutine

summary_markdown: Your nanites reject diseases with ease.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 5" pfs="Standard" > Inoculation Subroutine Source Ancestry Guide pg. 72 2.0 --- Your nanites reject diseases with ease. Each time you succeed at a Fortitude save against an ongoing disease, you reduce its stage by 2, or by 1 against a virulent disease. Each critical success you achieve against an ongoing disease reduces its stage by 3, or by 2 against a virulent disease.
